title: Metadata-Driven E-Learning Design Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Course Enhancing Learning Design Competency Using Metadata for Mid-Level Professional Learners in Manager/Leader Roles. Focused on Language Learning Application Cases

learning_goals: Learners can independently develop at least three online language learning modules using a metadata-based instructional design model.
Learners can identify over 80% of potential issues in the instructional design process using AI-based monitoring tools.
Learners can propose at least two strategies for adjusting personalized learning pathways through learning data analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
